page.title: 09Toys of Today
page.content: 6 year olds describe their most fashionable toys of the moment- My Little Pony:You can get'My Little Pony'off the television.They are different colours and have pictures on their sides.You can get big ones and medium ones and they are very pretty and I love them.You can comb their hair,they have cute eyelashes.The magical ones have wings and horns. Star Wars Figures:They came from films.They are from other planets.They battle in space.Some are robots,some are monsters and some are people.'Darthvader is the leader of the baddies.'Luke Skywalker' is the leader of the goodies.You can get the Ewok bears and their village.You can get spaceships and the Speeder bikes. The'Stardess'is the goodies'base.You can get weapons and you can get outfits.
